name: Huobi Group
slogan: The Financial Hub of Digital Assets
description: Huobi is a leading global crypto exchange with a 6-year track record of safety and reliability. Huobi provides secure and reliable digital asset trading and asset management services (including crypto exchange, derivative market, lending, OTC trading) to millions of users in over 130 countries around the world.

jobs.title: Crypto Trading Operations Manager (Middle office)
jobs.description:
The Huobi Group is a world leader in the digital asset industry, providing secure, stable and reliable digital asset trading and asset management services. Currently, Huobi Group has invested in more than sixty upstream and downstream start-ups. It has teams in Singapore, Japan, South Korea, United Kingdom, Australia, Canada, Brazil and Hong Kong to provide its secure and credible digital assets trading platform and asset management services to millions of users in over 130 countries around the world.

We are looking for an exceptional individual to join us as we develop our middle office for the Global Institutional Business. This role will put you at the forefront of the business development function, and requires strong organizational and analytical skills, exceptional written and verbal communication skills, and an ability to learn and understand customer desires and behavior in trading & investment in the cryptocurrency industry.


Responsibilities:

• Ensuring the best set-up for client accounts and establishes or makes updates to client accounts.

• Handle client requests to and regularly report on client issues, recommendations, criticism and trading activity

• Collaborate closely with the product/engineering team to improve our services

• Participate in documenting processes, identifying issues, and recommending updates to user guides

• Interact with internal data team to prepare daily, monthly reports to identify key business development opportunities

• Determine the appropriate method of data collection and research methodology of Huobi big data, analyses and interprets information gained and formulates and implements recommendations and solutions to optimise the Huobi sales and online service

• Proactively stay up to date about market trends, opportunities, risks and new projects, with a passion for the cryptocurrency and digital asset industry

Requirements:
• Prior work experience in the cryptocurrency market with a firm understanding of trading products and trade life cycles 

• Understands at least one of the following financial products: custody, OTC trading, futures market  

• Exceptional interpersonal communication, relationship management, and organizational skills

• Detail oriented, multi-tasking and able to handle various projects simultaneously under pressure

• Able to work independently as well as a good team player

• Flexible mindset to adapt to fast-changing market and new work tasks


Languages:

• Fluent in English and Mandarin Chinese (oral and written communication)

To apply – Please send your CV to globalbd@huobi.com

jobs.title: Marketing Manager
jobs.description:
We are hiring!
We are looking for a Marketing manager to join our growing Global Institutional Business Team in London. This role will allow you to drive our focus to reach institutional clients within the EMEA, CIS, and the Americas region.
We are committed to putting clients first and providing secure, professional, and honest services based on the core principle of putting the client first.
Huobi a world leader in the digital asset industry, providing secure, stable and reliable digital asset trading to millions of users in over 130 countries around the world. We are much more than an exchange, we are an ecosystem which provides a range of services that include but not limited to; Huobi Mining Pool, Huobi Wallet-a multi-chain crypto wallet, and the venture capital and investment arms that is Huobi Capital and Huobi Global Ecosystem Fund.
What you'll be doing:
•	Develop our institutional brand narrative and provide fresh, up-to-date materials for all teams to tailor to their needs.
•	Develop and implement overall vision for institutional marketing, introducing ideas and robust approaches for better understanding our clients’ needs and how we most effectively communicate with them.
•	Draft public announcements.
•	Manage presence at conferences, meetups, dinners, both online and offline
•	Measure impact and uncover insights across client activities to help guide decisions for future planning.
•	Proactively stay up to date about market trends, opportunities, risks and new projects, with a passion for the cryptocurrency and digital asset industry.
What we look for in you:
•	Prior work experience in the cryptocurrency market with a firm understanding of customer desires and behavior in trading & investment in the cryptocurrency industry.
•	Experience creating content about products, financial instruments, and asset classes across financial services relevant to institutional investors, family offices, funds, and VCs
•	Strong writing skills and excellent communicator.
•	Positive mindset. Possess the ability to bring solutions, not just problems, and pushing yourself to be the best that you can be.
•	Detail oriented, multi-tasking and ability to handle various projects simultaneously under pressure with good judgement.
•	Initiative and a self-starter. Can independently work from scratch with a flexible mindset.


Languages:
Fluent in English (oral and written communication)
Mandarin Chinese is a plus (oral and written communication)
Other European languages are desirable
Location: The candidate would be based in the London office in Moorgate.
To apply – Please send your CV to globalbd@huobi.com

jobs.title: Sales Internship Programme
jobs.description:
Responsibilities:

•	Shadowing and learning from the business development team and middle office as they develop client relationships, strategic channels and partnerships to drive sales of all Huobi institutional products.
•	Handle clients' inquiries and various customer support tasks.
•	Help the coordination and information synchronization between sales team and HQ.
•	Helping the sales and development function to promote Huobi’s institutional products offering to broader audiences and build Huobi Brand among target clients.
•	Help potential clients to understand Huobi’s products better and in the same time gather clients’ requirement to help improve Huobi’s institutional products. 


Requirements:

•	Prior work experience in financial markets, a firm understanding of trading products and trade life cycles 
•	Familiarity with the digital asset markets
•	Understands at least one of the following financial products: custody, OTC trading, futures market  
•	Exceptional interpersonal communication, relationship management, and organizational skills
•	Fluency in English; Knowledge of other languages is preferred.
•	Fluency in Mandarin is a big plus.

To apply – Please send your CV to Global.Institution@Huobi.com
